content.page-title: Working to help make opportunity possible for you
content.introduction-content: At Bank of America we are committed to helping our customers and clients achieve their opportunities at every stage of their financial life.As a company we have taken several actions to get back to fundamentals,to become a stronger bank.While we have made progress in many areas, there is more work for us to do.In the United States,we are addressing the foreclosure crisis and related issues through a national;community revitalization strategy;we are actively lending and investing across the nation including extending capital to consumers,wide businesses, large companies and others; and we are supporting workforce development efforts,hunger causes and neighborhood preservation through philanthropic  giving.And around the world, we are committed to the regions in which we do business with broad capabilities, and commitments to being a socially responsible partner.

body-content.heading: Who We Are
body-content.description: Our vision is to become the finest financial services company in the world

body-content.heading: What We Do
body-content.description: Our purpose is to help make opportunity possible for customers and clients and every stage of their financial lives

body-content.heading: Who We Serve
body-content.description: Strategic mergers have enabled us to better serve individuals, companies, institutional investors and stakeholders in every region of the world

body-content.heading: How We Work
body-content.description: With every customer interaction we want to demonstrate that we have our customers and client’s best interests in mind

body-content.heading: Where We Are
body-content.description: We’re around the world, and practically around the corner.We have 5,800 branches and 18,000,ATMs in the U.S.Over 30 million active users count on our award-winning online banking. Big picture: we’re in 40 countries,providing comprehensive market, industry, product and advisory expertise to more than 140,000 businesses around the globe
